name: Neural Network App
description:
The Hands-on Portal Digital Dashboard Neural Network Visualization Application Webble

Old Hands-on Portal application using the old version of the DigitalDashboard.

This Webble app loads a few DigitalDashboard components, connects them, and loads some data. Sets up a visualization environment to show the activation paths in neural networks on specific input data.
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
